meanings.definition: To rub or push gently against someone or something with the nose or face.
meanings.sent1: The puppy will nuzzle its mother for warmth.
meanings.sent2: The cat loves to nuzzle against my hand when I pet her.
meanings.sent3: The horse tried to nuzzle the carrot out of my pocket.
meanings.sent4: The soft breeze seemed to nuzzle against my skin like a gentle touch.
meanings.sent5: The child nuzzled the teddy bear close while falling asleep.

meanings.sent1: The siblings nuzzle together on the couch while watching TV.
meanings.sent2: The couple likes to nuzzle in bed before falling asleep.
meanings.sent3: The puppy nuzzled up to the kitten for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The warm blanket seemed to nuzzle around me, keeping me cozy.
meanings.sent5: The teddy bear nuzzled against the child's cheek, bringing comfort.

meanings.definition: An affectionate act of rubbing or pushing gently with the nose or face.
meanings.sent1: The dog's nuzzle against my hand was a sign of love.
meanings.sent2: The cat's nuzzle against my cheek made me smile.
meanings.sent3: The bunny's nuzzle against the carrot was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The gentle nuzzle of the horse's muzzle was comforting.
meanings.sent5: The child's nuzzle against the stuffed animal was heartwarming.
